item.title: Presentations at this year's ECCMID, Barcelona, Spain
item.description:
Margo Diricks and Nils Wetzstein are presenting their newest results on non-tuberculous mycobacteria at this year's ECCMID in Barcelona Spain, 27th-30th April 2024.

They will present:

Margo Diricks: Mycobacterium abscessus transmission and micro-evolution of resistance in a German cystic fibrosis centre, oral presentation, 29/04/2024, 13:30 in Hall D.

Nils Wetzstein: Clinical and genomic features of M. avium complex: a multi-national European study, poster, 28/04/2024, 12:00 in the poster area.

You can find the full program here.
We would be happy to see you there!
